column5: What is the opening day for Walleye in NW Ontario for 2003? 5/24/2003?????Bob
Walleye season always opens on the third saturday in May.
Walleye opener is always the 3rd Sat.in May. The 17th is the opener in 2003.
Where did you go opening weekend last spring if you don't mind telling? Just curious.Tom
Hi Tom,Would you mind telling us where you went last opener?Ha HaRoger Mayer.

Tom, I was on Lac des Mille Lacs for the opener. I have fished Lac on the opener for quite a few years and every year I head in a different direction on the lake. Usually it's where all the other 100's of boats are not. I should be on Lac in a few weeks doing some hard water fishing.
The opener is like they said always the 3rd sat in may.
